definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: Journalists are studying the minister's speech for pointers to the contents of next month's policy statement.
sentences.chinese: 記者們在研究部長講話以揣摩下月施政報告中的動向。

sentences.english: Ruling the nation by the filial piety was the principle of governance and administration characteristics in power during Tang Xuan' zong.
sentences.chinese: 以孝治天下是唐玄宗的治國原則和施政特點。

sentences.english: All neighbor states must revise their policy fundaments.
sentences.chinese: 所有鄰國都必須改變他們的施政基本原則。

sentences.english: It thus seems that people are rather positive about this year's address.
sentences.chinese: 由此看來，巿民似乎對施政報告有不錯的評價。

sentences.english: Members from the drafting group introduce the mock policy address during a press conference.
sentences.chinese: 起草小組成員於新聞發佈會上介紹模擬施政報告。

sentences.english: Fan Zengxiang's administrative style still has significance and value for our reference today.
sentences.chinese: 樊增祥的施政風格，在今天亦不無借鑑意義和價值。

sentences.english: Mr Tung will disclose more details in his policy address.
sentences.chinese: 董建華將在施政報告中透露更多詳情。

sentences.english: Are you satisfied with Tung Chee-hwa's administration policy?
sentences.chinese: 請問你整體黎講對董建華既施政方針滿唔滿意呢？

sentences.english: You should issue reports about your administration at stated periods.
sentences.chinese: 他要定期報告你的施政情況。

sentences.english: Part two recommends the measure of water conservancy construction of government.
sentences.chinese: 而政府施政條件的不足則影響了水利建設的成績。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal has said the government is determined to implement the policies and programmes unveiled today.
sentences.chinese: 普拉昌達總理稱政府決心執行今天頒佈的施政綱領。

sentences.english: On the whole, how satisfied are you with Tung Chee-hwa's policy direction?
sentences.chinese: 請問你整體黎講對董建華既施政方針滿唔滿意呢？

sentences.english: People from all walks of life, including government officials highly appreciate the mock policy address.
sentences.chinese: 模擬施政報告得到社會各界及政府部門的高度肯定。

definition: to come to power/to hold power/in office
style of governing (of minor official)/achievement in office
